mapper.select: SELECT * FROM FOOD_DIVISION ORDER BY FOOD_DIVISION_NAME
SELECT * FROM FOOD_UPPER ORDER BY FOOD_UPPER_NAME
SELECT * FROM MARKET WHERE MARKET_ENABLED = 1 AND FLAG = 2 ORDER BY MARKET_NAME
SELECT * FROM FOOD_UPPER WHERE FOOD_DIVISION_NO = #{searchNo} ORDER BY FOOD_UPPER_NAME
SELECT * FROM FOOD_SECTION WHERE FOOD_UPPER_NO = #{searchNo} ORDER BY FOOD_SECTION_NAME
SELECT * FROM FOOD_SECTION WHERE FOOD_UPPER_NO = #{upperNo} ORDER BY FOOD_SECTION_NAME

SELECT MAX(EVENT_PRICE) FROM EVENT WHERE (EVENT_CATEGORY = #{foodSectionNo} OR EVENT_CATEGORY IS NULL) AND (MARKET_NO = #{marketNo} OR MARKET_NO IS NULL) AND (EVENT_DATE_START < SYSDATE) AND (EVENT_DATE_END > SYSDATE)

SELECT * FROM FOOD F LEFT JOIN STOCK T ON F.FOOD_NO = T.FOOD_NO LEFT JOIN MARKET M ON T.MARKET_NO = M.MARKET_NO LEFT JOIN (SELECT TARGET_ID, COUNT(GOOD) AS GOOD, COUNT(BAD) AS BAD FROM GOOD GROUP BY TARGET_ID) G ON F.FOOD_NO = G.TARGET_ID WHERE F.FOOD_NO = #{foodNo} AND M.MARKET_NO = #{marketNo}
SELECT * FROM FOOD_SECTION ORDER BY FOOD_SECTION_NAME
SELECT * FROM FOOD_UPPER WHERE FOOD_DIVISION_NO = #{foodDivisionNo} ORDER BY FOOD_UPPER_NAME
SELECT * FROM FOOD_SECTION WHERE FOOD_UPPER_NO = #{foodUpperNo} ORDER BY FOOD_SECTION_NAME
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FOOD(FOOD_NO, FOOD_NAME, FOOD_SECTION_NO, FOOD_COMPANY, FOOD_MARKET_PRICE , FOOD_MEMBER_PRICE, FOOD_ENABLED, FOOD_ORIGINAL_FILE_NAME, FOOD_RENAMED_FILE_NAME) VALUES( 'FOOD'||LPAD(FOOD_SEQ_NO.NEXTVAL, 5, '0') , #{foodName}, #{foodSectionNo}, #{foodCompany} , #{foodMarketPrice}, #{foodMemberPrice}, DEFAULT , #{foodOriginalFileName}, #{foodRenamedFileName})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM FOOD F LEFT JOIN FOOD_SECTION S ON F.FOOD_SECTION_NO = S.FOOD_SECTION_NO LEFT JOIN FOOD_UPPER U ON S.FOOD_UPPER_NO = U.FOOD_UPPER_NO LEFT JOIN FOOD_DIVISION D ON U.FOOD_DIVISION_NO = D.FOOD_DIVISION_NO LEFT JOIN STOCK T ON F.FOOD_NO = T.FOOD_NO LEFT JOIN MARKET M ON T.MARKET_NO = M.MARKET_NO WHERE M.MARKET_NO = 'mar00012' ORDER BY T.STOCK_AMOUNT DESC) WHERE ROWNUM<=4

SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM FOOD F LEFT JOIN FOOD_SECTION S ON F.FOOD_SECTION_NO = S.FOOD_SECTION_NO LEFT JOIN FOOD_UPPER U ON S.FOOD_UPPER_NO = U.FOOD_UPPER_NO LEFT JOIN FOOD_DIVISION D ON U.FOOD_DIVISION_NO = D.FOOD_DIVISION_NO LEFT JOIN STOCK T ON F.FOOD_NO = T.FOOD_NO LEFT JOIN MARKET M ON T.MARKET_NO = M.MARKET_NO LEFT JOIN (SELECT TARGET_ID, COUNT(GOOD) AS GOOD, COUNT(BAD) AS BAD FROM GOOD GROUP BY TARGET_ID) G ON F.FOOD_NO = G.TARGET_ID WHERE M.MARKET_NO = 'mar00012' ORDER BY (GOOD-BAD) DESC) WHERE ROWNUM<=4

SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM FOOD F LEFT JOIN FOOD_SECTION S ON F.FOOD_SECTION_NO = S.FOOD_SECTION_NO LEFT JOIN FOOD_UPPER U ON S.FOOD_UPPER_NO = U.FOOD_UPPER_NO LEFT JOIN FOOD_DIVISION D ON U.FOOD_DIVISION_NO = D.FOOD_DIVISION_NO LEFT JOIN STOCK T ON F.FOOD_NO = T.FOOD_NO LEFT JOIN MARKET M ON T.MARKET_NO = M.MARKET_NO LEFT JOIN (SELECT TARGET_ID, COUNT(GOOD) AS GOOD, COUNT(BAD) AS BAD FROM GOOD GROUP BY TARGET_ID) G ON F.FOOD_NO = G.TARGET_ID WHERE M.MARKET_NO = 'mar00012' AND D.FOOD_DIVISION_NO = #{foodDivisionNo} ORDER BY (GOOD-BAD) DESC) WHERE ROWNUM<=4

SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM FOOD F LEFT JOIN FOOD_SECTION S ON F.FOOD_SECTION_NO = S.FOOD_SECTION_NO LEFT JOIN FOOD_UPPER U ON S.FOOD_UPPER_NO = U.FOOD_UPPER_NO LEFT JOIN FOOD_DIVISION D ON U.FOOD_DIVISION_NO = D.FOOD_DIVISION_NO LEFT JOIN STOCK T ON F.FOOD_NO = T.FOOD_NO LEFT JOIN MARKET M ON T.MARKET_NO = M.MARKET_NO LEFT JOIN EVENT E ON S.FOOD_SECTION_NO = E.EVENT_CATEGORY WHERE ((E.MARKET_NO ='mar00012' AND E.MARKET_NO IS NULL) OR (E.MARKET_NO IS NULL AND E.EVENT_CATEGORY IS NULL) OR (E.MARKET_NO IS NULL AND E.EVENT_CATEGORY IS NOT NULL)) AND E.EVENT_DATE_START < SYSDATE AND E.EVENT_DATE_END > SYSDATE AND T.STOCK_AMOUNT > 0 ORDER BY E.EVENT_PRICE DESC) WHERE ROWNUM<=4

SELECT * FROM FOOD F LEFT JOIN FOOD_SECTION S ON F.FOOD_SECTION_NO = S.FOOD_SECTION_NO LEFT JOIN FOOD_UPPER U ON S.FOOD_UPPER_NO = U.FOOD_UPPER_NO LEFT JOIN FOOD_DIVISION D ON U.FOOD_DIVISION_NO = D.FOOD_DIVISION_NO LEFT JOIN STOCK T ON F.FOOD_NO = T.FOOD_NO LEFT JOIN MARKET M ON T.MARKET_NO = M.MARKET_NO WHERE M.MARKET_NO = #{marketNo} AND M.MARKET_ENABLED = 1 AND FLAG = 2 AND T.STOCK_AMOUNT > 0 ORDER BY F.FOOD_NO DESC

SELECT * FROM FOOD F LEFT JOIN FOOD_SECTION S ON F.FOOD_SECTION_NO = S.FOOD_SECTION_NO LEFT JOIN FOOD_UPPER U ON S.FOOD_UPPER_NO = U.FOOD_UPPER_NO LEFT JOIN FOOD_DIVISION D ON U.FOOD_DIVISION_NO = D.FOOD_DIVISION_NO LEFT JOIN STOCK T ON F.FOOD_NO = T.FOOD_NO LEFT JOIN MARKET M ON T.MARKET_NO = M.MARKET_NO LEFT JOIN (SELECT TARGET_ID, COUNT(GOOD) AS GOOD, COUNT(BAD) AS BAD FROM GOOD GROUP BY TARGET_ID) G ON F.FOOD_NO = G.TARGET_ID WHERE M.MARKET_NO = #{marketNo} AND D.FOOD_DIVISION_NAME LIKE #{foodDivisionName} ORDER BY (GOOD-BAD) DESC

SELECT R.*, S.* FROM RECIPE_SEQUENCE S LEFT JOIN RECIPE R ON S.RECIPE_NO = R.RECIPE_NO LEFT JOIN RECIPE_INGREDIENT I ON R.RECIPE_NO = I.RECIPE_NO LEFT JOIN FOOD F ON F.FOOD_NO = I.FOOD_NO WHERE I.FOOD_NO = #{foodNo} AND S.RECIPE_ORDER = (SELECT MAX(RECIPE_ORDER) FROM RECIPE_SEQUENCE S LEFT JOIN RECIPE R ON S.RECIPE_NO = R.RECIPE_NO LEFT JOIN RECIPE_INGREDIENT I ON R.RECIPE_NO = I.RECIPE_NO LEFT JOIN FOOD F ON F.FOOD_NO = I.FOOD_NO WHERE I.FOOD_NO = #{foodNo}) AND ROWNUM <= 4
UPDATE GOOD SET GOOD = CASE WHEN GOOD IS NULL THEN 1 WHEN GOOD = 1 THEN NULL END ,BAD = CASE WHEN BAD IS NULL THEN 1 WHEN BAD = 1 THEN NULL END WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND TARGET_ID = #{foodNo}
SELECT TARGET_ID, COUNT(GOOD) GOOD, COUNT(BAD) BAD FROM GOOD WHERE TARGET_ID = #{foodNo} GROUP BY TARGET_ID

SELECT * FROM FOOD F LEFT JOIN FOOD_SECTION S ON F.FOOD_SECTION_NO = S.FOOD_SECTION_NO LEFT JOIN FOOD_UPPER U ON S.FOOD_UPPER_NO = U.FOOD_UPPER_NO LEFT JOIN FOOD_DIVISION D ON U.FOOD_DIVISION_NO = D.FOOD_DIVISION_NO LEFT JOIN STOCK T ON F.FOOD_NO = T.FOOD_NO LEFT JOIN MARKET M ON T.MARKET_NO = M.MARKET_NO WHERE M.MARKET_NO = #{marketNo} AND T.STOCK_AMOUNT > 0 ORDER BY F.FOOD_NAME
